poem:
### Shadows of Power

In silence traded, secrets unwind,  
Epstein's ghost walks unconfined.  
Across the seas, in desert lands,  
Hostages released by time's sands.  
Promises of peace, fragile, thin;  
Lives held by whispers on the wind.  
The world spins on, its tale half-told,  
Power's shadow, both ruthless and cold.
